record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - October 04, 2007)

[Page: S12828]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:32 p.m., adjourned until Friday, October 5, 2007, at 9:30 a.m.
